articles.title: Astronomers just captured the sharpest view of a distant star ever seen - Science Daily
articles.description: A UCLA-led team has achieved the sharpest-ever view of a distant star’s disk using a groundbreaking photonic lantern device on a single telescope—no multi-telescope array required. This technology splits incoming starlight into multiple channels, revealing pr…
articles.content: <ul><li>Sharper views from a single telescope: Normally, astronomers link multiple telescopes together to get the clearest images of distant stars and galaxies. A UCLA-led team has now achieved recor… [+6727 chars]
